articles.title: Experimental heart failure drug does not improve exercise capacity in HFrEF patients - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Patients with heart failure with reduced ejection fraction (HFrEF) did not experience any improvement in their ability to exercise vigorously after taking the experimental heart failure drug omecamtiv mecarbil, in a study presented at the American College of …
